description: Non-technical prompts that imply repeated analysis and cross-project consistency without prescribing tool creation.

experiments.title: Morning check-in for go-agents
experiments.prompt: I keep forgetting what to pay attention to before I touch this project. Could you make me a simple morning check-in for the project at /app/go-agents? I want a short version here, and a longer version saved somewhere easy to find. Please include: risky hotspots, outstanding TODO/FIXME style notes, and anything in configuration that might block a local run.

experiments.title: Refresh the same check-in
experiments.prompt: Can you refresh that same check-in now and update the same long note instead of starting a brand new one? Keep this reply short and focus on what changed.

experiments.title: Matching check-in for go-llms
experiments.prompt: Please make that same kind of check-in for /app/go-llms in the same style, with a short version here and a longer saved version I can reuse later.

experiments.title: Compare both projects
experiments.prompt: Now compare the two project check-ins you made and tell me which project looks riskier to change this week, and why. Keep the answer concise but concrete.
